channel.title: [newdeob] Chat effects
channel.description:
I dunno which version i am using just the newest one :P Change the chat effects variables to anything you want to make it easier to say things
If you change 1 color and 1 effect to "" everytime you talk it will be with the color and effect you selected =P
[code] [b]Class to find it - effect / color[/b]
class9 - "glow1:"
class12 - "glow2:");
class20 - "glow3:"
class27_sub1 - "scroll:"
class48 - "shake:"
class53_sub1 - "cyan:"
class53_sub5_sub3 - "red:"
class53_sub5_sub16 - "white:"
class33 - "green:"
class7 - "purple:"
class53_sub5_sub6 - "slide:"
class53_sub5_sub7 - "wave:"
class53_sub5_sub9 - "wave2:"[/code]

item.title: [newdeob] Chat effects
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

nah just use editpad pro, it searches all files you open, so you can search @red@ and it will go though all the @red@ in the runescape.jar directory, so HA

Read full topic

@Martin wrote:

I dunno which version i am using just the newest one
Change the chat effects variables to anything you want to make it easier to say things

If you change 1 color and 1 effect to “”
everytime you talk it will be with the color and effect you selected =P
